name: PottyHelper
0:
”Alexa, open Potty Helper.”
”Where should I go potty?”
”Can I go potty on the toilet?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: potty helper
des: Should I go potty in my underwear? Of course not! Let the Potty Helper give you some helpful guidance on where, and where not, to go potty.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
